name: Cat Fight
description:
Play in fullsceen so you're able to see the full game.

Cat Fight--

You play as an anonymous cat that can continously fight a omiment cat only known as the Other.  There is nothing else you can do but fight, so you might as well.

Controls:

Movement- arrow keys

Interact-- Enter button

You're also able to play with just the mouse but I don't fully know how exactly it works.

This is for the low effort game jam so it's very bare bones (also not as elaborate to avoid hitting the file limit.)

All the assets are either Rpgmaker mv's default assets or assets I made for an abandoned project that I reused ( The Cat and The Other's sprites and The Other's battle picture.)

Overall, I relearned how  to do basic events again in rpgmaker and learned I little more about File compression and about rpgmaker's inner workings so I call that a win!
